statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Mehmet is a nut cake seller. As the whole cake is too large and too heavy, a customer generally buys a specified part of it. The whole cake is a rectangle, while the specified part is a convex polygon region inside the rectangle. To get such specified part, Mehmet uses his sword to cut the cake. The only operation he can do is splitting a piece of cake into two parts by a straight cutting. As the cake is very solid, it cost as much as 1 unit energy to cut each length of cake. What's the minimum energy Mehmet has to consume to satisfy the customer?

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are multiple test cases. Process to the End of File.

The first line of each test cases contains three integers 3��N��100, 0<W��5000, 0<H��5000, where W and H are the width and height of the nut cake. The next N lines are the vertices of the specified part in clockwise or counterclockwise order. Each line contains two integers 0<Xi<W and 0<Yi<H.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, output the minimum energy with six digits after decimal point.
